item.title: Exporting, Editing & Replacing MODS Datastreams: Updated Technical Details
item.description: Attention: On 21-May-2020 an optional, but recommended, sixth step was added to this workflow in the form of a new _Drush_ command: _islandora\_mods_post\_processing_, an addition to my previous work in [islandora_mods_via_twig](https://github.com/DigitalGrinnell/islandora_mods_via_twig). See my new post, [Islandora MODS Post Processing](/posts/075-islandora-mods-post-processing/) for complete details. Attention: In November 2021 a recommended seventh step was added to this workflow. That addition is documented in the final section of this document. A 7-Step Workflow This document is follow-up, with technical details, to Exporting, Editing & Replacing MODS Datastreams, post 069, in my blog.
